Text: I was at this show.  Phenomenal night!!  Anyone who's been inclined to suggest that Axl was used up and past it has got their head firmly up their ass.  I think I might have came a little when Mr Brownstone came on.  Mwhahahahahahaha......
I was at this consert too ;))

just for the record- the track called "the blues" here is on chinese democracy- it's actually "street of dreams." cool download though- anyone know who it is that rips slash's old guitar solo on sweet child?  it's an awesome job...
